name: Scatter (itch) (HalfAMirror)
description:
Help Crystal avoid as many snakes as she can! This is a quick project made for learning how to use Godot. All of the pixel art was done by me. The font is Thaleah Fat by Tiny Worlds, the music is from Royalty Free Music Pack Volume 2 by Tim Beek, and the sound effect is from 50 Sound FX For Your Game by FALLENBLOOD.

Use WASD keys to move!
